item.title: Learn How to Use Terminal
item.description: Table of Contents Overview Precision + Speed Quickly Copy+Paste Stuff Download YouTube videos Conclusion Figure 1. Scary Computer Stuff (or How I Learnt to Stop Worrying and Love the Terminal). Overview The terminal (and it’s Windows counterparts, the Command Prompt and PowerShell) are terrifying to behold if you have no idea what you’re doing. In When to Start Naming Things, we’ve talked about text labels and design conventions in graphic interfaces.
